specific - relation - general.cyper_for_intermediate_page:
MATCH (snp_node:sequence_variant:snp)-[r:fine_mapped_eQTL_of]->(gene_node:gene) WHERE snp_node.id = '@sequence_variant@' RETURN snp_node, r, gene_node
			MATCH (snp_node:variants)-[r:fine_mapped_eQTL]-(gene_node:coding_elements {id:'ENSG00000188312'})
RETURN snp_node,r,gene_node
specific - relation - general.cyper_for_result_page_all_nodes_specific: ?MATCH (g:gene {id:@gene_node@})-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?

general - relationship - specific.cyper_for_result_page_all_nodes_specific: ?MATCH (g:gene {id:@gene_node@})-[r]-(neighbor) RETURN g.id AS GeneID, type(r) AS RelationshipType, collect(neighbor.id) AS NeighborIDs
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?
